articles.title: European stocks head for lower open as investors brace themselves for U.S. inflation data - CNBC
articles.description: European markets were lower on Thursday as investors around the world prepared themselves for the latest U.S. inflation data.

articles.title: Users in New Zealand, Australia, and Europe Can Now Join PlayStation Stars Loyalty Program - Appuals
articles.description: PlayStation Stars will be available in Europe, New Zealand, and Australia on October 13th after its initial release in Asia and US. Users in these areas can now sign up for the service on the website.
